item.title: Furhaven L Chaise Dog Beds for Small/Medium/Large Dogs & Cats – Orthopedic, Cooling Gel, Memory Foam, & More
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Pamper your pet with a Furhaven Deluxe Orthopedic Two-Tone Plush Faux Fur & Suede L Shaped Chaise Lounge Sofa-Style Living Room Corner Couch Pet Dog Bed! A luxuriously soft faux fur sleep surface is complemented by suedine covered bolsters and gusset. Ultra-plush, flecked faux fur provides a snuggly soft sleep ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $63.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:09 UTC – Details)


Pamper your pet with a Furhaven Deluxe Orthopedic Two-Tone Plush Faux Fur & Suede L Shaped Chaise Lounge Sofa-Style Living Room Corner Couch Pet Dog Bed! A luxuriously soft faux fur sleep surface is complemented by suedine covered bolsters and gusset. Ultra-plush, flecked faux fur provides a snuggly soft sleep surface and trims the edges of the bolster for a chic flair. The two-tone design hides dirt and pet dander better than traditional plush sleep surfaces. The L-shaped bolsters support your pet’s back and hips, providing additional support. The L-shape also provides the perfect nook for pets that like to nest into comfort. The two raised, rounded bolster ends allow your pet to lay their paws or neck on the pillowed edge, helping to align the neck and spine. An orthopedic foam base features egg-crate foam that alleviates aching joints and provides soothing comfort to pressure points. The Jumbo Plus option, for larger breeds, features solid slab orthopedic foam for greater support and comfort. The zippered cover is easily removed and machine washable for your convenience. Available in various stylish colors and diverse sizing options so your pet can sprawl and lounge the day in maximum comfort and style.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 40 x 32 x 8 inches; 4.7 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 44541089
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Furhaven Pet Products, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L8DKL77
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

SLEEP SURFACE: The main sleep surface is lined with cuddly soft, plush faux fur, while the supportive bolsters are wrapped in easy-care suede; both materials are gentle on noses and paws for enhanced snuggling and burrowing comfort
EASY ON JOINTS: The egg crate orthopedic foam base helps cushion pressure points and improve air circulation, while the fluff-filled bolster railings support the neck, back, hips, and joints; both help to ease discomfort and encourage restful sleep
PRODUCT DETAILS: Marine Blue; Jumbo, 40″ x 32″ x 8″ (4″ Foam; Sleep Surface: Approx. 35″ x 27″)
AVAILABLE VARIANTS: The bed comes in Espresso, Dark Sage, Stone Gray, and Marine Blue; it’s also available in Small, Medium, Large, Jumbo, and Jumbo Plus
EASY CARE: The removable dog bed cover is completely machine washable for your convenience; for more specific washing instructions, please refer to the hang tag and/or seam label (if applicable)
CUSTOMER ASSURANCE: The product comes with a 90-day limited coverage against material defects and may also qualify for our 60-day Worry-Free Program; restrictions apply: purchases from unauthorized 3rd-party resellers may not be covered by Furhaven
NOT SUITABLE for pets with excessive teething or destructive chewing behavior

Read more

Color: Marine Blue

Inviting in form and function, this super cozy bed is designed to provide optimum comfort for pets of all ages. The chaise design features dual L-shaped fluffy bolsters for extra cushioned loft, as well as great orthopedic support for both cats and dogs.

(The product pictured is the Large size. Please refer to the chart below for other available sizes and dimensions.)

Sleep Surface

The sleep surface is lined with high pile faux fur fabric that is luxuriously soft and plush to the touch, a great complement to the smooth, wear-resistant micro suede covering the sides and bolsters.

Bolster Design

The fluffy-filled bolsters are lightweight but supportive. The L-shaped design ensures plenty of high-loft headrest cushion, as well as a cozy nook for pets to burrow into. The bolsters also provide great orthopedic support for aching joints.

Read more

Egg Crate Orthopedic Foam Base

The egg-crate foam core soothes pressure points and provides great support for aching joints and muscles so pets can enjoy a more restorative night’s rest. The peak-and-valley design also works to improve air circulation for enhanced comfort.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam

Our foam is 100% manufactured in the USA and independently tested through the CertiPUR-US program to ensure that it meets the standards for content, emissions, and durability.* To reduce our carbon footprint, our beds may be shipped under compression; allow up to 48 hours for the foam to expand and regain its original shape. For bolsters, gently squeeze and loosen any clumped fill material to promote better recovery after compression.

(*Certification issued by Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam, Inc. for 2019)

Sizes & Dimensions

Medium: 30″ x 20″ x 6″

Large: 36″ x 27″ x 6.5″

Jumbo: 40″ x 32″ x 8″

Jumbo Plus: 53″ x 40″ x 9.5″

Read more

Additional Information

Machine Washable Cover

Recycled Fluffy Fill Bolsters

Available in Multiple Sizes

Authentic Furhaven Merchandise

Read more





Pet Bed Frame
Perfect Comfort Sofa
Hooded Donut Bed
Travel Bed w/ Stuff Sack
Ball Bed
Warming Hi Lo Cuddler Bed
Features Mid-century modern design, supportive bamboo slats, easy assembly, compatible with most Furhaven beds Three bolsters, removable cover, your choice of foam filling Comes with attached blanket, cozy donut design, non-slip base, entire bed is washable Comes with stuff sack, reversible sleep surface, lightweight, portable Cozy and malleable bean bag design, removable cover, zippered liner for easy refill Enclosed nest design, heat reflective self-warming base, entire bed is washable
Multiple Colors
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
Multiple Sizes
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

4.5
Price: $63.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:09 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $59.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:07:22 UTC – Details)


WHY CHOOSE NICEEDAY LUMBAR SUPPORT PILLOW? Effective back pain reliefs
With taller &thicker design, NICEED Lumbar support pillow for office chair alleviates pain from a greater surface area, including stiffness and tension in the mid- and lower-back region. We are focus on your back aches from sitting, muscle aches from lifting and exercise, arthritis, herniated disks and general soreness. The contoured shape supports your back’s natural curve for proper spinal alignment and to promote healthy posture. 100% memory foam cushion
lumbar support for car has 3D mesh breathable design that offers support and comfort for perfect ergogenic positioning,naturally regulate temperature, wick moisture and reduce odor. A fabrication known for cushion and bounce, memory foam holds your lower back in proper posture. 3D ergonomic design
One main lower breathable mesh part. Extra thick and wide. our ergonomic pillow is made to fit the spine’s natural curve and the body’s natural form. Two higher parts on two sides gently hold front your waist. The impression-making effect of memory foam will also take pressure off your spine, gently guiding your body into a healthy position that circulates blood and relieves tension. Application Fields
This seat pillow is suitable for office chair, car seat, wheelchair,recliner, gaming chair, any home chair or seat on a bus, airplane or train. And backrest pads is suitable for drivers, teachers, students, people need wheelchair, pregnant women, office workers etc. Reliable and friendly customer serviceTips:
Since it’s temperature sense memory foam cushion, it’s normal that cushions become harder in low temperature, cushion’s softness will be adjusted by user or environment temperature
100% Preimum Memory Foam
【UNIQUE UPDATED JOINT BREATHABLE & HYPOALLERGENIC 3D MESH COVER & PREMIUM SUEDE】 – With removable and machine washable mesh cover, this support pillow can keep air circulation well and always keep you back cool and comfortable, dry for the best experience, so sweat and moisture doesn’t fill it up, suitable for all seasons. The back suede material enables the back cushion suitable for all year round.
【Perfect Lumbar support pillow for all kinds of office chair / car】 If you spend a lot of time sitting on office chair and driving in car, this back cushion will perfectly help you. It is designed ergonomically to relieve upper, mid and lower back pain and back tightness, support you to achieve a healthy posture and helps maintain the natural curve of the spine.
【Memory foam Support for Back and Lumbar & Suitable for All People】Memory Foam with Bamboo Charcoal Fiber Back Cushion can keep its shape and be used repeatedly. Comes the best elasticity, which makes our product support your back in a proper posture. Unlike other lumbar support pillow, our product with designed curve and waist embracing design, hold your back all the time. Perfect size for office workers, pregnant, drivers and students to improve their posture and keep healthy.
【NON-SLIP & NEVER FLAT】Orthopedic Backrest with adjustable elastic straps design ensuring back cushions stays on the seat without any slipping or sliding. Whether you are driving a car, lying on the couch, watching TV, playing video games, or studying and even working, Villsure Lumbar Support Pillow is the perfect one specially designed for you. Its thoughtful care, smooth curve, elegant appearance, let you linger.
【Best Gift for Friends and Families】This premium quality ergonomic lumbar support cushion is a perfect gift for parents,office staff,teachers,drivers,students who sit for a long time.All our products provide 60-DAY NO HASSLE RETURNS Try it now with no worries

Do you have lumbar pain after working long hours?

Do you have lumbar pain during long flights, cars etc?

According to relevant statistics, about 70%-80% of the people, in their lifetime have had back pain experience. Experts believe that sitting for a long time, make whole body weight presses completely in lumbosacral ministry, pressure is distributed unevenly, can cause waist, abdomen, back muscle drooping or ache. In addition, fixed posture or posture can also cause back pain.

So in order to prevent back pain, sitting during the day, you need a Niceeday lumbar support pillow!

Niceeday 2020 Updated NEW Lumbar Support Pillow

Ergonomics and Contoured Design

Using ergonomic design to simulate the curve of the human spine, its contoured design can sufficiently alleviate the pain and fatigue of lumbar and vertebra area, and perfect helps to realign your back and spine.

A Larger Size than Other Cushions

Thicker and wider, this back cushion can perfectly split most of the body's weight evenly on the lumbar spine, provide enough support for your waist,so as to reduce upper, mid and lower back pain from sitting or driving for long periods of time.

Product Introduction

  1. Size: 18.9 * 15.4 * 5.1 inches；
  2. Material: 100% Memory Foam；
  3. Color: Black ,Weight: 1.5 LB；
  4. Package Included: 1 Back cushion*1 instruction for Use

Features

  • 1.Relieves pains of back and lumbar
  • 2.Provides a full lower back support
  • 3.Breathable and Washable Outer Cover
  • 4.Helps for Spine Pressure & Corrects posture 5.Fits many kinds of chairs

Read more

100% High Density Memory Foam

Niceeday back cushion adopts premium high density memory foam that can keep its shape, absorb the stress from long sitting, release the waist pressure, feel soft and comfortable and made without harmful substances.

Removable and Washable Cover

1.With breathable 3D mesh cloth and soft velvet cover, this back support pillow can keep back air circulating well,and keep it soft and comfortable.

2.With zipper, the cover can be easily removed and cleaned. Please wash it gently by hand or by machine.

Adjustable Double Straps

1.The adjustable double straps can firmly fix the lumbar support cushion on the back of the chair and keep it in place, without slipping or falling down.

2.The back cushion is suitable for most of office chair, car seat, wheelchair, game chair, home chair or seat on a bus, airplane or train.

Side Pocket

A pocket on the left side of the back cushion, where you can place or get your pen, mobile phone, power bank or data line at any time.It is very convenient and smart.

Adjustable Double Straps Wide Range Application

1.Niceeday for every its product, we are dedicated to every detail to do the best. Our back cushion use strong metal zipper to ensure that you can easily put on or take off the cover. You can also see the neat lines, highlighting the quality of the back cushion. High quality buckle allows you to adjust the length of the strap at will, so that the lumbar support pillow is firmly fixed in its position.

2.Adjustable elastic double straps make the cushion suitable for many kinds of chairs and can be used in two ways. You can decide whether to use them in parallel or cross use according to your own needs.

ENJOY YOUR SITTING TIME WITHOUT PAIN!

Suitable for all kinds of occasions

Whether you are in office, studying at home, resting on sofa, or driving a car, the back cushion always can provide enough support for your back and waist.

Best gift for people who sit for a long time

Niceeday lumbar support pillow can reduce back and waist pain, suitable for all people, especially pregnant women, students,drivers, the elderly, long-time office workers, people in a wheelchair etc. Give them a back cushion to enjoy a pain-free life with you!

Warm Tips

Inner memory foam which can not washable extends the durability of foam core.

Since it's temperature sense memory foam cushion, it's normal that cushions become harder in low temperature, cushion's softness will be adjusted by user or environment temperature.

If you have any other questions, please contact u s and we will be happy to assist you. Just find your order of us and click contact the seller. We promise you 100% satisfied reply!

4.5

item.title: Bedsure Orthopedic Dog Bed, Bolster Dog Beds for Medium/Large/Extra Large Dogs – Foam Sofa with Removable Washable Cover, Waterproof Lining and Nonskid Bottom Couch
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Designed especially for older or arthritic dogs, Bedsure’s Orthopedic Memory Foam Sofa Pet Bed features an egg crate foam filling and a flannel-covered center seat to provide your four-legged friend with extra comfort. Other Dog Beds Memory Foam Orthopedic Removable Washable Cover Waterproof Function Nonskid Bottom Product Dimensions ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.99 - $34.39
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:15:47 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Designed especially for older or arthritic dogs, Bedsure’s Orthopedic Memory Foam Sofa Pet Bed features an egg crate foam filling and a flannel-covered center seat to provide your four-legged friend with extra comfort.

Other Dog Beds Memory Foam Orthopedic Removable Washable Cover Waterproof Function Nonskid Bottom

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 28 x 7 x 23 inches; 6.69 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 10, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Bedsure Comfy Pet
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089QXMQXK
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Sofa-Style Bed Design: The 3-sided 3.5″ bolstered side pillow adds extra support to your pet’s neck and head for a more restful sleep.
Cozy Spot: The sleep surface (28”x23”) is made of a flannel cover that provides a soft and comfortable sleeping area for dogs or cats.
Nonskid Bottom: The non-slip, studded plastic bottom can fix the position of your dog bed, so it brings the dog a sense of security.
Easy to Care: Removable cover with zip closure for easy cleaning. The inner foam has a TPU cover, which provides protection from dog pee and excrement.

Designed especially for older or arthritic dogs, Bedsure’s Orthopedic Memory Foam Sofa Pet Bed features an egg crate foam filling and a flannel-covered center seat to provide your four-legged friend with extra comfort.
